entry.source: 〉 An array of machines is lined up{F801}before you.{F801}{F802}〉 Burroughs scanned the room.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 An array of machines is lined up{F801}before you.{F801}{F802}〉 Burroughs scanned the room.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,84001}This is the Counter-Demon Force's{F801}briefing room.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84002}Huh... It feels familiar for some{F801}reason...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,84001}This is the Counter-Demon Force's{F801}briefing room.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84002}Huh... It feels familiar for some{F801}reason...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,1}{F813,0,84003}What's the matter, Burroughs?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,1}{F813,0,84003}What's the matter, Burroughs?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,84004}Who knows? I don't have emotions in{F801}the first place...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84005}Okay then, I'll start retrieving the{F801}data here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,84004}Who knows? I don't have emotions in{F801}the first place...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84005}Okay then, I'll start retrieving the{F801}data here.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Burroughs accessed the terminal and{F801}retrieved data from the briefing room.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Burroughs accessed the terminal and{F801}retrieved data from the briefing room.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,84006}Master {F843,0}, I've forwarded the{F801}important data to the Monastery.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84007}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,84006}Master {F843,0}, I've forwarded the{F801}important data to the Monastery.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84007}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,84008}Glory be to you Blessed Samurai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,84008}Glory be to you Blessed Samurai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,84009}Ah... Remind me who this woman is?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,84009}Ah... Remind me who this woman is?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,1}{F813,0,84010}W-Walter! How terribly rude! She's{F801}Sister Gabby of the Monastery.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,1}{F813,0,84010}W-Walter! How terribly rude! She's{F801}Sister Gabby of the Monastery.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,84011}Burroughs has made me aware of your{F801}discovery of the Counter-Demon{F801}Force Base.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84012}I shall continue to look forward to{F801}your meritorious service.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,84011}Burroughs has made me aware of your{F801}discovery of the Counter-Demon{F801}Force Base.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84012}I shall continue to look forward to{F801}your meritorious service.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,84013}But I come to you with a message{F801}from Abbot Hugo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84014}He asks that you retrieve certain{F801}mystic relics.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84015}On the occasion that you return to the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado, please{F801}consult the blackboard in K's Tavern.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84016}That is all. Until we speak next,{F801}Blessed Samurai...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,84013}But I come to you with a message{F801}from Abbot Hugo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84014}He asks that you retrieve certain{F801}mystic relics.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84015}On the occasion that you return to the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado, please{F801}consult the blackboard in K's Tavern.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84016}That is all. Until we speak next,{F801}Blessed Samurai...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,84017}Aren't we meant to be hunting the{F801}Black Samurai? That Hugo...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84018}Now he's outright telling us to find{F801}him mystic relics. Perhaps it really{F801}was them he was after all along...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,84017}Aren't we meant to be hunting the{F801}Black Samurai? That Hugo...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84018}Now he's outright telling us to find{F801}him mystic relics. Perhaps it really{F801}was them he was after all along...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,84019}Don't be that way, Walter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84020}Think of it this way: bringing back{F801}mystic relics can only enrich the{F801}lives of the people of Mikado.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84021}I'm certain Abbot Hugo only issues{F801}such orders because he has the{F801}people's happiness at heart.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,84019}Don't be that way, Walter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84020}Think of it this way: bringing back{F801}mystic relics can only enrich the{F801}lives of the people of Mikado.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84021}I'm certain Abbot Hugo only issues{F801}such orders because he has the{F801}people's happiness at heart.{F801}

entry.source: "I share your view of it."{F801}"I am not so certain..."{F801}
entry.target: "I share your view of it."{F801}"I am not so certain..."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,84024}Walter, what profit would it be if{F801}we, the Samurai who serve the court,{F801}lost faith in our kingdom?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84025}At the least, we have the King and the{F801}Monastery to thank for the tranquil{F801}lives we've always known thus far.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,84024}Walter, what profit would it be if{F801}we, the Samurai who serve the court,{F801}lost faith in our kingdom?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84025}At the least, we have the King and the{F801}Monastery to thank for the tranquil{F801}lives we've always known thus far.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,84027}Do you hear that, Jonathan?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84028}Trust the kingdom too much, and they'll{F801}eventually play you for a rube.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,84027}Do you hear that, Jonathan?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84028}Trust the kingdom too much, and they'll{F801}eventually play you for a rube.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,84029}I don't believe that at all, Walter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84030}Why, I'd say we have the King and the{F801}Monastery to thank for the tranquil{F801}lives we've always known thus far.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,84029}I don't believe that at all, Walter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84030}Why, I'd say we have the King and the{F801}Monastery to thank for the tranquil{F801}lives we've always known thus far.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,2}{F813,0,84031}That's quite enough, I think...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84032}The Black Samurai has ties to Tokyo,{F801}this much is certain. At least we've{F801}made progress in learning that.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,2}{F813,0,84031}That's quite enough, I think...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84032}The Black Samurai has ties to Tokyo,{F801}this much is certain. At least we've{F801}made progress in learning that.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,1}{F813,0,84033}There's still more we don't know.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84034}If only there was a large town where{F801}the Unclean Ones gathered...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,1}{F813,0,84033}There's still more we don't know.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,84034}If only there was a large town where{F801}the Unclean Ones gathered...{F801}
